title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 510.2 - Legal base
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 510.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Section
7.09
of the

Mental Hygiene Law grants the Commissioner of Mental Health the power and
responsibility to adopt regulations that are necessary and proper to implement
matters under his/her jurisdiction. (b) Article 6 of the Public Officers Law
(Freedom of Information Law) establishes the criteria under which the public
may access the records related to the process of governmental decision
making. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
510.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
